remarks: Cancellation law for division and multiplication.  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divmuld.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
divdiv23d.5 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
dmdcan2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. ( B / C ) ) = ( A / C ) ) $.
